Package org.sibermatica.util.logging

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
org.sibermatica.util.logging.Logger
public final class Logger extends Object

Logger

This class it's used to log messages to the system console and write them to a file. Can handle some various log files and output streams.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Ciro Alejo Diaz
